name: presets_allways_enabled
label: Allways enable presets
tooltip: This option enables presets on all maps. Will not allways work when the extension is to slow to load.

name: mock_user
label: Mock user
tooltip: This option mocks a user so you don't have to be logged in to see the extension working.

name: no_confirm_mark_unmark_all
label: No confirm mark/unmark all
tooltip: This option removes the confirm dialog when you click the mark/unmark all button.

name: use_declarative_net_request
label: Enable DeclarativeNetRequest API
tooltip: Block map script using DeclarativeNetRequest API which makes the extenions more reliable, but is sometimes not supported by the browser.
